short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives you reminders & tips for improving posture and recommends posture-friendly products when shopping online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Posture Protector gives you reminders and tips for improving your posture while sitting at a desk, and gives you recommendations for other posture-friendly routines and products.
